introduce.title: Savvycom.ai
introduce.description: Savvycom.ai is an ecosystem that seeks to promote and showcase innovative products made with blockchain and AI technologies. Our projects venture beyond the business sphere, aspiring to enact good changes on the societal level.

teams.title: Meet our team
teams.description: Experienced and passionate engineers of blockchain and AI technologies

products.title: Our Products
products.description: AI & Blockchain integration beyond the business sphere, aspiring to enact good changes on the societal level.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: Opportunities don't happen, you create them

items.title: The journey begins
items.description: Passionate and experienced AI and Blockchain engineers promote innovative products made with blockchain and AI technologies. Our projects venture beyond the business sphere, aspiring to enact good changes on the societal level.

items.title: Savvydex
items.description: A decentralized plaftorm for trading, farming, staking cryptocurrencies in a flexible and efficient way. The cross-chain technology is demonstrated! Our goal for this new release is to expand the prevalence of Savvycoin, aspiring to grow a bigger community in the world of crypto.

items.title: Savvybird
items.description: The first play-to-earn game for our GameFi ecosystem. With blockchain technology being optimized, the game is expected to exert an explosive effect where the players can unwind and earn more money at the same time, without leaving the phone screen.

items.title: Savvy Fitness
items.description: SavvyFitness, our action-to-earn AI & Blockchain integration for fitness, aims not only to become the AI-and-blockchain healthcare and fitness platform to improve peopleâ€™s healthy lifestyle, but also to contribute to the growth of the blockchain community.

items.title: Savvy Entertainment
items.description: Our entertainment-to-earn AI & Blockchain integration for music will be the latest product in Savvy ecosystem, where people can discover a completely new musical experience and immerse themselves in personalized art space through technology.

footer.description: A disruptive integration of AI and Blockchain technologies to enact good changes on the societal level.
